level.heading: Enforcement.
level.text: ยง 16-517 Enforcement. Notices of violation for violations of any provision of this chapter or any rule promulgated hereunder may be issued by authorized employees or agents of the commission. In addition, such notices of violation may be issued by the police department, and, at the request of the commission and the consent of the appropriate commissioner, by authorized employees and agents of the department of consumer affairs, the department of small business services, the department of transportation, and the department of sanitation.
